Job Description:
• Propose architectural concepts for buildings, villas, houses to line manager/project manager.
• Provide advice and develop design documents to initiate and modify architectural, interior design and space planning solutions.
• Work independently or with architects/engineers to design and prepare plans and specifications.
• Prepare cost estimates, and coordinate implementation of capital improvement projects and oversee the work. 
• Prepare and/or review preliminary designs, work drawings, specifications and cost estimates related to the project.
• Performs design drafting including preliminary drawings, working drawings and full detail drawings for architectural and mechanical works associated with building construction or improvement projects.
• Manage, supervise and coach the Architect team members so that they can improve their capabilities to design advanced works and to produce accurate architect design drawings and shop drawings in the targeted timescale.
• Ability to interpret planning to site engineers/relevant parties.
• Work with relevant parties to produce effective results.
• Generate/consolidate progress reports to line manager.
• Perform other tasks as assigned by Architect Manager/Head of Project and Technical.
Job Requirement:
• Master’s or bachelor’s degree in Architectural Design/Urban Planning or related field.
• At least 5-6 years of proven experience and 2 years in leading position in Architect (Construction/Real Estate company is a priority.)
• Personnel management and continuing professional development.
• Ability to use design apps which include V-ray for Sketch Up, 3D Max AutoCAD, Photoshop and Microsoft office, etc.
• Build and maintain relationship in the team and overall company departments/project.
• Oversee team performance and ability to manage team members and alternative conflict.
• Interpersonal awareness.
• Ability to encourage others.
• Communication and time management skills.
• Quality and industry knowledge.
• Documentation skills.
• English proficiency.
• Good morale and integrity.

Job Description:
• Oversee all recruitment processes to ensure the outstanding vacancies are recruited within the agreed timescale planned.
• Proactive approach by ensuring all candidate pools is in hand and properly update to all related hiring managers.
• Monitor all related employee onboarding and out-boarding processes.
• Provide all related staff induction programs to ensure a warm welcome for new employees and coordinate with all related departments if required.
• Assist in developing job descriptions that aligned with hiring managers and ensure all requirements and tasks are aligned to hire the best talents.
• Take the lead with all employee committees to take all related employee engagement activities such as employee’s birthday, staff party, team building, oversea trip and others.
• Take lead all HR system-related and manage the team to have a proper up to date.
• Provide all related employee relations/consultancy if employees required further updates related to company policies, do’s and don’ts, compliance, conflict of interest, and others policies related.
• Assist the manager in maintaining and keeping all targets for Key Result Areas (KRAs) and Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) from overall departments/projects and the Company as a whole.
• Train, coach and discipline staff under supervision to ensure high productivity and staff morale.
• Assist with line manager to monitor all related training and development plans. 
• Perform other tasks as assigned by line manager.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s degree in Management, Business Administration, or related fields. 
• At least 5 years of experience with real estate companies or with sizable construction organizations, or manufacture.
• Experience in dealing with cross functions in HR.
• Experience working in a team-oriented, collaborative environment.
• Knowledgeable of related labor law and compliance.
• In-depth knowledge of recruitment activities, coordinate on performance management, training and employee engagement.
• Project management and risk management.
• Demonstrate ability to manage complex HR projects within established timeframes and on budget.
• Proficiency in Microsoft Office programs, such as Word and Excel, Outlook.
• Strong interpersonal skills with a positive attitude of working with the team.
• Ability to handle multiple tasks and coordinate of work crews concurrently.
• Ability to communicate well in both written and oral English.

Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.

5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

position: Retail Sales Manager ប្រធានផ្នែកលក់តាមហាង ($1500 - $2000)
Job Description:
Provide Leadership
•	Develop, lead and manage teams to deliver excellent customer service in terms.
•	Assist in embracing culture change by guiding and educating the team to understand the company vision, mission and core values.
•	Institute a metric for measuring efficiency and productivity among the sales team.
•	Assist in the development of marketing campaigns that are designed to expand brand recognition and increase sales

Implement Customer Focus Operations
•	Develop strategies for sales representative's response time to customers.
•	Monitor sales response times to current and potential customers.
•	Monitor customer service responses in accordance with team KPIs. 
•	Work with site managers and sales team customer response times and closing rates

Prepare Reports & Performance Outcomes
•	Produce and analyze monthly sales reports for all team members under your supervision.
•	Report Monthly Contract Values per site for each salesperson. 
•	Provide Monthly Performance Management report action plans.
•	Conducting sales training to individual sales team and retail sales managers

Implement Sales Process
•	Implement a repeatable sales process. to all site sales team members.
•	Analyze quarterly sales reports.
•	Monitor the retail sales pipeline.
•	Utilize a sales pipeline for retail and project sales.
•	Coach retail site managers and sales team members.  
•	Execute Monthly Sales Strategy Plans
•	Use of Prospecting Activity Reports to generate qualified leads and identify inquiries
Job Requirement:
•	Minimum a bachelor's degree, preferable in the areas of Business Administration or Marketing.  
•	Proven sales experience.
•	Proven history of meeting sales targets.
•	Effective communication skills
•	Excellent negotiation, customer service and consultative sales skills.
•	At least 5 years of work experience in Sales. 
•	1-2 years managerial experience.
Company Profile:
Sinh Hak Hout is one of the leading home improvement centers in Cambodia. Starting from just a 50-square-meter retail space in 1999, we have expanded our current operations into a 6400-square-meter show space. Our mission is to provide an excellent customer experience through understanding our customers’ needs and delivering high quality home improvement products across every channel and market that we serve. Our key success is based on believing that When our team members are happy, they deliver great service. When guests experience great service, they are happy. Happy guests make our business a success.

Job Description:
** This role is responsible to:
• Carry out the In-Field Audit with the Sales Teams with objectives to uplift the Sales Capabilities.
• To Prepare the Field Audit reports by Region and by Province with the objective of closing the Sales Capabilities Gaps.

** Main Duties 
• Carry out Field Audits with Sales Rep focus on company’s 4 Key Enablers (Sales Tools, Winning Team, Perfect Serve, Excellent Outlet Execution) and 5 Winning’s Behaviors (Learn to Improve, Keep It Simple, Life-Saving Rules, Collaborate Through Trust, Speed & Action)
• Track and monitor the performance of the Sales Team against the standards (FIT, PICOS & EOE), identify the gaps, and propose the training program to meet the changes in the markets and competition’s condition.
• Identify the Performance and Sales Capabilities gaps, propose the actions plans and work together with the SAM to close the gaps.
• Provide feedback on the In-Field Coaching program and standard, propose to Improve the measurements for perfect execution in the market.
• Collaborate with Sales Development Supervisor in the assigned Region to work out the quick and instant training to close the performance or sales capability gaps.
• Update the Track, Rank & Publish (TRP) results in the assigned Region on daily basis.
• Track and Monitors the efficiency and effectiveness of FIT (Focus, Implementation & Tracking) and Picture of Success (PICOS) implementation in the Region.
• People Development 
  - Learn to Improve and Self Development Behaviors
  - To conduct the In-Field Audit with Sales Reps and provide the guidance to improve the performance
Job Requirement:
• Preferably a minimum of 4 years in an FMCG environment with at least 2 years Supervisor experience in Sales and Training or Coaching roles, ideally in an FMCG/beer environment
• Having experience in Training Consultant is highly preferred
• Mobile and required to travel between the Provinces on a regular basis
• Integrity, Self-Discipline, Trustworthy and reliable
• Excellent communication skills (interpersonal/presentation/Computer)
• Good at interpersonal skills, coaching, and mentoring skills
• Solid analytical, Planning, and Organizing skills
• Excellent business acumen and a good understanding of the market with entrepreneurial zest
• Self-starter mindset, Self-Confident, good work Ethic, Assertive and Problem-solving skills
• Effective, Positive and Energetic Attitude
• Ability to communicate clearly - Decent presentations skills

Job Description: • Lead an international team of Purchasing Agents dedicated to Spare Parts purchase orders creation.• Review processes and deliverables ensuring high standard service level with continuous improvement focus.• Monitor internal customer adherence to procurement Principles & Practices and processes within the assigned scope.• Monitor the implementation of sourcing strategies and processes across local market/cluster.• Conduct buying and post-order management activities ensure proper handling and resolution of procure-to-pay exceptions.• Determines method of procurement such as direct purchase, quotes or bids.• Coordinating with suppliers to ensure that they have all materials needed for production.• Ensuring the quality of products or services by monitoring suppliers’ performance and making recommendations for improvement.• Inspecting goods that have been delivered to ensure they are in good condition and that they match the specifications in the order form.• Reviewing purchase orders to ensure they are accurate and complete.• Drives a culture of “Do It Safe, Do It Right the First Time” with actions and words on a daily basis.• Safely and efficiently performs assigned processes to meet the required daily logistics activities.• Collaborates and communicates with logistics technicians, customer service representatives, quality personnel, and others involved in the shipment and receipt of products about information related to the shipment.• Compiles carrier and route assignments.• Tracks, traces, and updates the status of shipments.• Successfully conducts and completes all assigned trainings.• Participates in continuous improvement training and trains others.• Oversees hazardous waste storage areas, hazardous waste documentation, equipment, and procedures.• Prepares hazardous waste shipments, including proper labeling of all hazardous waste.• Provides additional backup support for shipping and receiving departments.• Other task assigned by Manager.
Job Requirement: - Quick learner with the ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously, maintain focus, and adapt to a variety of challenges- Ability to conduct detailed procedures in a time constrained environment- Good written and verbal communication skills- Strong sense of time organization and urgency- Able to work independently and within a team

Job Description: •	Assists the President/CEO with daily administrative duties and completes a broad variety of administrative tasks that include managing an active calendar of appointments; completing expense reports; composing and preparing correspondence; arranging complex and detailed travel plans, itineraries and agendas and compiling documents for meetings.•	Drafts reports, letters of solicitation, proposals; prepares and coordinates oral and written communication with donors and prospects.•	Provides high-level, confidential administrative support to the office of the CEO. Duties may be clerical, administrative and project-based and include scheduling travel, arranging meetings, handling information requests, preparing reports and correspondence and liaising with board members. This position is often privy to confidential information and as such, requires diplomacy and discretion.•	Other task assign by CEO
Job Requirement: •	Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to build relationships with stakeholders, including staff, board members, external partners and donors.•	Previous experience working with development and fundraising programs to increase donor contributions and funding sources.•	Proficiency in Windows, including MS Word, EXCEL and PowerPoint; fund-raising data management systems knowledge helpful.•	Ability to learn new software (Doodle polls and Director’s Desk board portal)•	Ability to work independently and with professional discretion.•	Excellent writing, editing, grammatical, organizational, and research skills.•	Ability to work with a broad range of people including major donors, Board members, foundation staff, colleagues of the president/CEO and staff, others•	Knowledge of other languages and international customs is an asset; knowledge of French or Spanish is helpful.•	Excellent management, time-management, and problem-solving skills.
Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

1- HLH Agriculture (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
2- HLHI (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
3- Royal Hong Lai Haut One Company Limited.
4- Jewel A Development Co., Ltd.
5- Agri-Oral Joint Cooperate Co., Ltd.
6- Public Housing Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
7- PH One Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

Company Profile:
ZISPP uses a UK-standards based curriculum with a values-based approach to academic, physical, emotional, and social development for its students. Our teachers are all highly qualified professional native speakers of English with a heart for children, a strong understanding of their needs, and a desire to be a guiding light to the future for each student. They understand well and are deeply committed to their roles as facilitators in bringing the International Primary Curriculum (IPC) to life in the classroom. 

Zion International School of Phnom Penh is an agency of the not-for-profit, NGO Cambodia Jobs Foundation located in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 

We believe that children learn by doing. They should be actively engaged in discovering, exploring, and doing in order to maximize opportunities for learning and growth

Job Description: 1. Scope of working:-Procurement Manager: is responsible for handling and developing all purchasing activity by choosing the best quality of equipment, goods and services for the company or organization at the most competitive prices.2. Duties & responsibilities:•	Comply with group procurement policies and procedures •	Plan, organize and lead the overall procurement operations of the assigned team•	Negotiate best possible procurement and logistics terms with vendors to ensure the company obtains the best commercial advantage possible•	Lead and facilitate ongoing Vendor Approval Process with Technical team to assure all vendors are qualified•	Conducting commercial analysis and price benchmarking of all vendor proposals•	Pursue and implement cost reduction activities to improve overall business performance•	Manage problem solving, arising due to vendor’s failures, changes in legislation, tax, financial regulations•	Prevent procurement errors and costs involve to the company•	Drive Cost Reduction and Cost Saving•	Administer the system in coordination with other function persons to ensure purchase requisition and purchase orders are efficiently processed in line with policy and process that shall be implemented from time to time•	Supports when necessary those responsible for ensuring the company’s inventory is maintained to adequately meet the company’s operation needs, orders replenishment goods, coordinates organization of stocked items as requested from submitted with approved Purchase Requisitions•	Ensure all signed contracts are communicated to all relevant parties to provide contract visibility and awareness,interpretation to support implementation•	All supporting docs such as quotation, RFP/RFI or any other related docs are in placed with proper filing for future records•	Coordination and supervision of Purchase Ordering and delivery schedules•	Provide accurate analysis report & information to the Director/Deputy Group Chief Procurement Officer•	Advises management in appropriate for the revise team job description to meet the actual job requirement when required •	Establish performance metrics (KPI) to monitor effectiveness and efficiency of procurement activities.•	Perform other related duties as assigned from Director/Deputy Group Chief Procurement Officer
Job Requirement: 3. Qualification & requirement:•	Understanding integrated supply chain and logistic concepts and be able to communicate supply chain objectives clearly and convey the benefit to the Company•	Knowledge of Local taxes and INCOTERM•	Knowledge of relevant regulatory requirements•	Knowledge of procurement and inventory management system •	Time management skills with the ability to manage multiple tasks in various stages of completion efficiently and effectively•	Good budgeting and IT skills•	Proficient in MS Office, Excel, PowerPoint and Outlook•	Effective communication and presentation skills and fluent in both written & spoken in English•	Examples of adding value as both an individual contributor and active team member•	Dynamic, self-motivated, initiative and able to communicate effectively with all levels•	Strong analytical skill, negotiating skills, attention to details and target oriented•	Strong, problem-solving and organizational skills•	Chinese/Thai is advantage•	Able to travel domestically and internationally•	Work under pressure  4.Working Days and Hours- Monday to half Saturday: 	8:00am to 12:00pm & 1:00pm to 5:00pm- Lunch time: 		12:00pm to 1:00pm5. Work place- Procurement Manager:  is based at Head Office of Borey Peng Huoth, Procurement Department.6. Relationship- Procurement Manager:  works under supervision & reports directly to Group Chief Procurement Officer.7. Salary and Benefit- Salary - Annual bonus (Base on KPI)- Annual Salary Increment- Annual Staff Party- Annual Trip- Car / Gasoline allowance - Education Sponsorship- Internal and External Training- Seniority pay base on labor law- Maternity allowance - Follow public holiday

job title: Warehouse Supervisor  /ប្រធានឃ្លាំង
position: Warehouse Supervisor  /ប្រធានឃ្លាំង
Job Description:
1- ទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការរៀបចំយុទ្ធវិធីគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុកទំនិញ និងការងារគ្រប់គ្រងបុគ្គលិកឃ្លាំង ធានាបានប្រសិទ្ធិ   ភាពការងារខ្ពស់
2- ទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការចាត់ចែងដឹកនាំរៀបចំការលើកដាក់ទំនិញទាំងទំនិញចូលឃ្លាំង និងទំនិញបញ្ចេញឃ្លាំង។
3- ចាត់ចែងដឹកនាំ បុគ្គលិក-កម្មករ ស្តុកផ្នែកបញ្ចូលទំនិញក្នុងឃ្លាំង ធានាថាទំនិញត្រូវបានបញ្ចូលក្នុងឃ្លាំងបានទុកដាក់ទាន់ពេលវេលា ត្រឹមត្រូវតាមទីកន្លែងកំណត់
4- ចាត់ចែងដឹកនាំបុគ្គលិក-កម្មករស្តុកផ្នែកបញ្ចេញទំនិញ ធានាថាទំនិញត្រូវបានបញ្ចេញទាន់ពេលវេលា ត្រឹមត្រូវតាមប័ណ្ណបញ្ជាលក់
5- ទំនងទំនងយ៉ាងជាប់លាប់ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃជាមួយផ្នែកលក់ស្តីពីពត៌មានការរៀបចំទំនិញបញ្ចេញអតិថិជនឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។   
6- ចាត់ចែង និងដឹកនាំផ្នែកដឹកជញ្ជូនទំនិញក្នុងការផ្គត់ផ្គង់ទំនិញពីឃ្លាំងរហូតដល់ទីតាំងអតិថិជន បានទាន់ពេលវេលា និងប្រគល់ទំនិញដល់អតិថិជនគ្រប់ចំនួនបានត្រឹមត្រូវតាមការបញ្ជាទិញ
7- ទំនាក់ទំនង និងសហការការងារល្អជាប្រចាំជាមួយផ្នែកផលិតកម្មក្នុងការរៀបចំ និងទទួលទំនិញមុនបញ្ចូលក្នុងឃ្លាំង
8- ចាត់ចែងដឹកនាំការងារត្រួតពិនិត្យសមតុល្យស្តុកទំនិញជាប្រចាំ និងរាយការណ៌ពីមុខទំនិញស្ថិតក្រោមកំរិតរក្សាស្តុក ឬលើសពីលំហូរការលក់
9- ពិនិត្យពីផលប៉ះពាល់នានា និងរាយការណ៏ពីការរក្សាទុកទំនិញ ដែលអាចនាំអោយមានការខូចខាត បាត់បង់ និងទំនិញហួសកាលកំណត់ប្រើប្រាស់
10- ទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការចាត់ចែង និងត្រួតពិនិត្យការរាប់ស្តុកទំនិញប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៏ ប្រចាំខែ ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងធ្វើរបាយការណ៏ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់លំអៀងដែលអាចនឹងកើតមាន
11- បំពេញកិច្ចការផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ថ្នាកដឹកនាំក្រុមហ៊ុន
Job Requirement:
1- បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ / ធនាគារ / ពាណិជ្ជកម្ម / គ្រប់គ្រង រឺសញ្ញាបត្រប្រហាក់ប្រហែល
2- មានបទពិសោធន៍លើការងារក្នុងតួនាទីនេះចាប់ពី ៣ ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ 
3- មានចំណេះដឹង/ជំនាញ ផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងបុគ្គលិក និងស្តុកទំនិញ  
4- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ក្លាហាន មានទំនូលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការងារ និងតួនាទី
5- គោរពពេលវេលាអោយបានទៀងទាត់មានភាពឆ្លាតវៃក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា
6- មានផ្នត់គំនិតរៀន និងអភិវឌ្ឍន៏ចំណេះដឹងជាប្រចាំ 
7- សម្របខ្លួនធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម និងកែលំអរការងារជាប្រចាំ
8- ចេះប្រកុំព្យូទ័រ MS. Word, Excel, E-mail, and Accounting Software (ERP)

Company Profile:
HMC Broiler is our supply chain which is created to add value to the slaughtered-aged broilers from HMC farm*. The main business activities are slaughtering activity and supplying channels to the supermarket markets and retail stores.
Product portfolios, from slaughter house of HMC Broiler, guaranteed quality and safety to the consumers. Items ranging from whole bird to cut-up meats, wing, drumstick, half-chicken, chicken feet, etc., aiming to meet daily market demand. Products will be stored in a preserved environment such as cold showcases and cold rooms to maintain stable quality and increase consumers’ awareness on food safety for themselves as well as their loved ones. 
By collecting output from HMC Farm with cost efficient and healthy broilers, HMC supply channel will be able to sell their products with affordable price to our potential clients at various markets. 
Through client-first approach, HMC broiler will have networks of supply chain throughout the country aiming to make sure our product portfolio is nearby and within reach by clients to experience its high-quality products—which affordable price and hygiene is our non-negotiable unique proposition to our customers.

-	Have working experiences in heavy industrial or manufacturing is preferable.

Company Profile:
Start your career at Arup, listed in Engineering News Record as one of the top “Best Green Design Firms”, “Top Global Design Firms”, and featured on Fortune Magazine's "Change The World" list of companies that are making the world a better place.

Arup is an independent engineering and consulting firm of 14,000 people in 42 countries around the world. Founded in 1946, we are the creative force at the heart of many of the world’s most prominent projects in the built environment, including the Sydney Opera House, the London Eye, and the Beijing National Stadium (aka the Bird's Nest).

During your career at Arup, you’ll have the chance to engage in a fulfilling career and work with some of the most highly respected engineers and specialists in the world. You’ll also get the opportunity to work on exciting and significant projects, delivering quality work that has a positive and lasting influence on the community and the environment.
Contact Info: Contact Information Thomas Zazworka  023 963 103 phnompenh@arup.com Room 301, 3rd Floor Vattanac Capital No. 66 Preah Monivong Boulevard, Phnom Penh 12000, Cambodia 023 963 103

Job Description:
Relationships: The Secretary will report to the Office leader and will work closely with the Finance and People department and all other members of the company.

Job Brief: to provide secretarial, accounting and administrative support services to the Office Leader.

** Duties and Responsibilities:
As Secretary for a small office based in Phnom Penh, Cambodia and the other staffs based on site, the candidate will perform the full range of typical financial management, administrative management and Human resources duties.

** Finance:
- Review Financial Statement.
- Review Annual Tax Declaration.
- prepare Monthly Tax Declaration.
- Any other tasks as assigned by manager.
- Prepare monthly tax declaration.
- Prepare E-Vat filing independent.
- Accounting and tax consulting for client.
- Working closely with the tax officer and dealing on the issue regarding tax form and filling.
- Process consultancy fees as per agreement and requirement.
- Maintain up-to-date expenses report in an efficient and easily retrievable form and coordinate with local financial officer and HQ finance team.
- Be capable to organize and file everything in hardcopies.

** Human Resource:
- Update monthly NSSF.
- Ensure that our HR policies are in compliance with local regulations and law by paying attention to any update/changes on labour acts.
- Assist and support any recruitment tasks, such as interview arrangement, local job board posting, etc.
- Other HR related tasks to be assigned by EA People Team / Office Leader
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree in Accounting or Finance or relevant qualification (Student studying Tax Agent,  ACCA are encouraged).
- 5 years post graduate experience in tax or accounting field.
- Be able to use MS Office programmers.
- Knowledge of accounting procedure and formats.
- Taxation Knowledge will be considered preferentially.
- High computer literacy with strong excel skill for financial modelling.
- Good command of spoken and written English (students studying ACE or with TOFEL are encouraged).
- Honest, Hardworking, flexible and high responsibility.
- Be patient and be a good team player.

Job Description: • Assist to manage a customer management business process which ensures effective communication and liaison between Sales, Marketing and other departments in order to optimize key business opportunities.• Develop, plan and execute channel strategies and trade promotions for the key accounts and trade channel to achieve sales objectives. Ensure these strategies are in tandem with the positioning and potential of the accounts / channels.• Monitor competitive activities and submit monthly report to track frequency and types of promotions taking place in the various trade sectors, documenting such activities for analysis, reporting and future referencing purposes.• Work with Demand Planner to monitor and improve accuracy of category sales forecast by channel & chain, in accordance to the monthly forecast schedule.• Identify sales gaps and work with the respective Key Account Executive / Manager to propose close gap measures.• Take initiative to discuss and develop plans to assist Brand Manager and Key Account Manager to maximize the category potential in each of the retail account.• Identify customers who do not meet the Company’s guidelines and recommend action to improve level of requirements.• Interact with Sales & Marketing regarding deadlines / lead time required for promotions, pack / price changes, new products, POSM and others in order to ensure on-time and effective implementation.• Assist in managing the delivery of Trade Events driving budget and process efficiencies within the business.• Work closely with the principle to ensure that the work runs smoothly.• Any other duties assigned by the Manager.
Job Requirement: - Excellent verbal and written communication skills- Ability to prioritize and organize workloads independently when required- Team player and the ability to work across different multi-media platforms and departments- To set own priorities in line with business needs and work constructively within the team and on your own initiative- Ability to problem solve and ‘make things happen’- Attention to detail- Ability to analyze research projects- Event management- Willingness to learn and develop with the role

Job Description:
Key Responsibilities:

1.	Capex: 
•	Provide accuracy analyst on capex projects for management to make decision whether to invest or not
•	Do the post analyst capex projects to ensure the projection Vs actual are on tracking and give the narrative on gap
•	Prepare company Capex Cash spend for RE, BP and LRP
•	Tracking Capex project through RFA system, PO and IM to ensure there is no over budget and compliance with LCOA and Capex policy
•	Monthly prepare and present the update capex spend to CMT
•	Ensure BIG Reporting are on time and accuracy
2.	Effective Business Partners:
•	Provide advanced analysis, insight, influence, and challenge, from a finance perspective, to enhance the quality of business decision-making and drive improved performance –
•	Delivering accurate, reliable, and timely financial reports to support decision making as per agreed time 
•	Conduct “budgeting concept” to non-CO finance staffs (One time per year) 
•	Ensure teams deliver/meet stakeholder’s expectation as well as group reporting 
•	Set and manage KPI’s in accordance with the company’s policy
•	Develop Team plans for projects as required and manage team resources to ensure deliver to committed tasks
3.	System and process Management 
•	Ensure business process, system and operating routines are full compliance with governance standard
•	Standardize data, information management, policy, and procedures standards.
•	Ensure that delivered costs spend is accordance with S.P.P 
•	Maximize system capabilities and leverage SAP.
Job Requirement:
Requirements:

•	Bachelor’s Degree in Finance and Accounting.
•	At least 2 years planning and analysis relevant experience 
•	Knowledge in SAP system is preferable
•	Excellent communication skills
•	Advanced knowledge of Microsoft office (emphasis on Excel & Access)
•	Strong initiative and ability to manage multiple tasks
Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.
Contact Info: Contact Information TALENT ACQUISITION TEAM  010 325 777 / 096 48 99 677 / 096 355 6214 / 012 916 444 hrd@coca-cola.com.kh No.287, National Road 5, Mittapheap Village, Russey Keo District, Phnom Penh,  Kingdom of Cambodia. 010 325 777 / 096 48 99 677 / 096 355 6214 / 012 916 444

Company Profile:
AnyMind(Thailand) Limited

Founded in April 2016, AnyMind Group is a brand enablement platform that provides individuals and businesses with solutions for brand building, manufacturing, e-commerce and marketing through various products including AnyDigital for advertising, AnyTag for influencer marketing, AnyManager for online publishers, AnyCreator for influencers, along with AnyFactory and AnyShop for D2C influencers and brands. To date, AnyMind Group has raised funding of US$62.3 million, from investors including (but not limited to) LINE, Mirai Creation Fund, VGI, Japan Post Capital and JAFCO Asia. Job Description:
JOB SUMMARY:

The audit supervisor is responsible for internal audit works assigned by the Head of Internal Audit at Chip Mong Commercial Bank (CMCB). The audit supervisor will report the results of work to the Head of Internal Audit.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES: 

•	Performs job-related duties as assigned
•	Review audit working papers and testing in accordance with the audit plan
•	Review internal audit reports
•	Coordinates and interrelates with all departments.
•	Assists head of internal audit in establishment and development of audit manual/audit policy 
•	Assists head of internal audit in establishment and development of the audit approaches and procedures in accordance with audit manual/audit policy
•	Contributes to the improvement of the Bank’s policies and procedures
•	Monitors and evaluates program effectiveness; effects changes required for improvement
•	Trains, supervises and evaluates the performance of junior staff
Job Requirement:
JOB REQUIREMENT:

•	Degree in accounting and finance-related field
•	ACCA qualified an advantage 
•	4 or more years in audit experience 
•	Knowledge of Audit and Assurance
•	Knowledge of accounting and finance
•	Knowledge of Taxation in Cambodia
•	Knowledge of business operations 
•	Team player with strong interpersonal, communication, and project
•	Fast and pro-active learner
•	Ability to work under pressure
•	Strong presentation, written communications, and report-writing skills in English and Khmer
•	Advanced level in Ms. Office
•	Possess initiative and have an analytical mindset
•	Flexible to travel in cities and provinces
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Company Profile:
Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC began operations in Cambodia in January 2013. It is the leading life insurer in Cambodia with more than USD280 million assured and 27,000 policies issued (as at 31 September 2015). One of the first life insurers in Cambodia, Prudential Cambodia is committed to raising the awareness of life insurance among the Cambodian people and helping them protect and secure their financial futures.

It serves around 25 million insurance customers and have £505 billion of assets under management (as at 30 June 2015). Prudential plc is listed on the stock exchanges in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and New York.

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.

Job Description:
• Faculty: Business
• Location: Touk Kork, Phnom Penh
• Schedule: Part Time & Full Time
• Salary: N/A

Duties
• Planning teaching, including delivering lectures, seminars or tutorials and creating teaching materials
• Setting, marking and moderate examinations and assessments
• Checking and assessing students' work
• Meeting students individually or in group to discuss progress
• Supervising students' research activities, including final year undergraduate projects dissertations
• Carrying out administration, such as attending faculty meetings and writing reports
• Writing research proposals, papers, publications and actively contribute to the institution's research profile
• Carry out administrative tasks related to the department, such induction programmes and involvement in committees and boards
• Contribute to professional conferences and seminars in your field of expertise
• Liaising with other professionals/employers
• Other tasks as assigned
Job Requirement:
• Master Degree in Business or equivalent in related fields
• At least 2 years of relevant experience in education or business
• Good interpersonal skills and teamwork
• Native or excellence English language
• Excellent oral and written communication skills in order to deliver lecturers, workshops and presentations
• Networking skills in order to build relationships with other faculty member, both in the UK and within your own department
• Good research skills and the ability to organise your own workload and research group
• The ability to manage your time within competing demands and work under pressure
• The capability to work both independently and collaboratively as part of a team
• Good general IT skills.
• A flexible approach to work and willing to learn new things

Salary and Benefits
• Competitive salary
• Paid holiday and observances, annual leave, sick leave, special leave
• NSSF Insurance
• Team Building budget: annual party, team building trip and staff annual trip
• Visa Fee expense and process
• Work Permit Fee expense and process

How to Apply
Interested candidates may send your CV and Cover letter to email: office@springboard4education.com or submit the CV and Cover Letter directly to the company address SpringBoard House No. 6, Street 574, Boeung Kok II quarter, Toul Kork
district, Phnom Penh, Cambodia
Company Profile:
SpringBoard4Cambodia is found in 2007 and officially registered in Cambodia in 2008. We operate as a Social Enterprise, with surplus from commercial activities being used for education related CSR (corporate social responsibilities) project in Cambodia such as building school in remote communities, funding English speaking and debating society, funding women entrepreneurship events, funding the British Alumni Association of Cambodia, funding exchange students program with partner’s university/college..etc. 

SpringBoard4Cambodia’s main commercial objectives are to promote international education in the UK, English language training through the British English Learning Centre, Campus UK, and Examination services for the Cambridge English Languages Assessment, University of Cambridge and IELTS test of the British Council. SpringBoard4Cambodia is a certified British Council trained agent, the Cambridge English Authorized Centre of the Cambridge English Language Assessment of the University of Cambridge in the UK, and the British Council IELTS test venue in Cambodia.

Job Description: តួនាទី ''មន្ត្រីឃ្លាំមើលកាមេរ៉ាសុវត្ថិភាព" រៀបចំឡើង ដើម្បីជំនួយគាំទ្រយ៉ាងសកម្មដល់នាយកដ្ឋានរដ្ឋបាល ក្នុងការធានានូវដំណើរការការងារប្រកបដោយភាពរលូន និងឆ្លើយតបនឹងតម្រូវការរបស់បេសកកម្ម ទស្សនៈវិស័យ និងគោលដៅរបស់នាយកដ្ឋានរដ្ឋបាល។ មន្រ្តីឃ្លាំមើលកាមេរ៉ាសុវត្ថិភាព ទទួលបន្ទុកការងារ និងជំនួយដល់ប្រធានក្រុមក្នុងការធានាដល់ការប្រព្រឹត្តទៅដោយរលូន និងជួយពង្រឹងកិច្ចការងាផ្នែករដ្ឋបាលនៅគ្រប់ការិយាល័យ ផ្តោតទៅលើ ការទទួលបន្ទុកក្នុងការឃ្លាំមើលប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពការិយាល័យទាំងមូល ដូចជាប្រព័ន្ធកាមេរ៉ាសុវត្ថិភាព ការបំពេញការងាររបស់ភ្នាក់ងារ សន្តិសុខ ឃ្លាំមើលឧប្បត្តិវហេតុផ្សេងៗនៅតាមការិយាល័យ-ផ្ទះអេធីអឹម គ្រប់គ្រងសន្តិសុខ-សុវត្ថិភាពការិយាល័យ-ផ្ទះអេធីអឹម ២៤ ម៉ោងលើ២៤ម៉ោង ០៧ថ្ងៃ ក្នុង០១សប្តាហ៍ និងថែរក្សាទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិរបស់ធនាគារហត្ថា ម.ក ឲ្យបានគង់វង្ស។Location: ការិយាល័យកណ្ដាល-ភ្នំពេញDuties and Responsibilities.ប្រចាំការនៅបន្ទប់ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងឃ្លាំមើលកាមេរ៉ាសុវត្ថិភាព ដោយចែកកាលវិភាគវេនប្រចាំការ និងត្រូវឃ្លាំមើល សុវត្ថិភាពការិយាល័យ.កត់ត្រាទុក ឬថតសម្លេង ឬរូបភាពវីដេអូ ចេញពីកាមេរ៉ាសុវត្ថិភាព និងរក្សាទុកដើម្បីប្រើប្រាស់.ឃ្លាំមើលសុវត្ថិភាពរូមនៅបវិវេណជុំវិញអាគារការិយាល័យ.តាមដាននូវដំណើរការរបស់កាមេរ៉ាសុវត្ថិភាពគ្រប់ការិយាល័យ របស់ធនាគារហត្ថា ម.ក.ត្រួតពិនិត្យសកម្មភាព អវត្តមានរបស់ភ្នាក់ងារសន្តិសុខនៅគ្រប់ការិយាល័យ.ទំនាក់ទំនងល្អប្រសើរជាមួយប្រធានតំបន់របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនសន្តិសុខ ដើម្បីធានាបាននូវសេវាកម្មសន្តិសុខល្អ.ទទួលព័ត៌មានស្តីពីបញ្ហាផ្សេងៗ និងភាពអសកម្មរបស់ភ្នាក់ងារសន្តិសុខ.ដោះស្រាយរាល់បញ្ហាដែលកើតឡើងពាក់ព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពរួមរបស់ធនាគារហត្ថា ម.ក និងត្រួតពិនិត្យឧបករណ៍ប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពគ្រប់ការិយាល័យ.ត្រួតពិនិត្យលើការឃ្លាំមើលសន្តិសុខ-សុវត្ថិភាពរួមរបស់ការិយាល័យធនាគារហត្ថា ម.ក.ទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអាជ្ញាធរ សន្តិសុខ និងបុគ្គលិកពាក់ព័ន្ធភ្លាមៗ ដើម្បីដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាបន្ទាន់ ករណីឃ្លាំមើល ឃើញឧបទ្ទវហេតុកើតឡើងនៅតាមសាខា.ត្រួតពិនិត្យ តាមដានការធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពលេខទូរស័ព្ទរបស់អាជ្ញាធរ សន្តិសុខ និងបុគ្គលិកពាក់ព័ន្ធ.ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ស្តីអំពីសកម្មភាពសុវត្ថិភាពផ្សេងៗជូនថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រង និងបំពេញភារកិច្ច និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវដទៃទៀតតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
Job Requirement: .សញ្ញាបត្រកំរិតបរិញ្ញាបត្រឡើងទៅ.មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធរិតតែប្រសើរ.មានចំណេះដឹងលើជំនាញកុំព្យូទ័រ (Ms. Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Internet & Email).អាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាអង់គ្លេសបាន.ព្យាយាម ស្មោះត្រង់ និង មានការប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងល្អ
Company Profile:
Hattha Bank is a leading bank in Cambodia, licensed by National Bank of Cambodia. Having been operating for more than 26 years with MDI status in the market, with its rapidly success, Hattha Bank has transformed its status from MDI to commercial bank in 2020, and continue providing diversified financial services to individual and SME businesses; and jump into retail consumer financial market and corporate customer in urbanities.

Hattha Bank is a subsidiary of Bank of Ayudhya (Krungsri), the fifth largest commercial bank in Thailand, and a member of MUFG Bank, the Japan’s largest banking group, and one of the largest and most diversified financial groups in the world.

job title: បុគ្គលិកលក់ក្នុងហាង (Sales Associate, Circle K)

Job Description:

- ត្រូវមានសញ្ញាបត្រមធ្យមសិក្សាទុតិយភូមិ ឬនិស្សិតសាកលវិទ្យាល័យ

- ត្រូវមានភាពឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម និងចូលចិត្តធ្វើការជាក្រុម

*ម៉ោងការងារ:

- វេនរសៀល​ (01:30 PM - 10:30 PM)

Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

Currently Circle K Cambodia is having more than 35 Store locate in the following:
- Phnnom Penh
- Siem Reap
Contact Info: Contact Information Circle K, Recruitment Team  085555194 hr@circlekcambodia.com Domnak Thom Village, Sangkat Stoeung Meanchey, Khan Meanchey, Phnom Penh 085555194

Job Description:
You’ll be a mentor guiding merchandising and branding teams to make more informed decisions by providing technical and product design expertise, in turn helping our stores obtain
the best products required for Canadians to enjoy the jobs and joys of everyday living.
Our best QCA Specialists are experienced in product development, testing and auditing practices and well as manufacturing engineering quality control and management to ensure consistent production delivery and address key issues and demonstrate continual improvement. They possess the relevant product knowledge that makes them technical experts in evaluating product quality and developing corrective action plans.

If you want to help shape the next chapter of the Canadian Tire story and share in the success of the hard work that our efforts yield, get in touch. We want to hear from you!

** Responsibilities:
- Oversee Quality Compliance Analyst activities in Asia for assigned categories, including Preliminary Factory Audit, review of new development samples and quality control plan, take lead on review of pilot production and mass production, take care of pre-shipment inspection, handle quality complain and investigations, support vendor development and improvement
- Develop and educate vendors to use quality tools like PFMEA and control plan on new product development projects and continuous improvement.
- Develop and lead vendor training sessions to ensure quality systems are up-to-date and CTC quality program is understood
- Monitor and report on 3rd Party Service Providers activities to ensure they perform at or above their required service levels
- Act as Product Quality Assurance expert with PRO team, vendors, and Category Business Managers (CBM) in the Asian market
- Liaise with Canadian Tire Corporate (CTC) Home Office Quality Assurance team and other stakeholders to execute Product Quality activities
- Execute and monitor the certification of vendors for producing private label products for CTC, including the different tiers for brand quality levels
- Prepare and conduct the Product Quality kick off at PRO office in support of Merchandising buying trips
- Provide technical support to PRO merchandisers and CBM’s while on sourcing trips and during finalization
- Monitor and report on high-profile projects to ensure full visibility and vendor compliance to CTC direction with regards to product development, investigations, and corrective actions
Job Requirement:
- University degree in Engineering is a MUST, prefer major in electrical engineering or mechanical engineering
- Background with electrical and electronic industry is preferred, Smart Home project experience is definite plus
- Sound knowledge in the Canadian safety Standard
- At least 5 years practical working experience in product development, engineering or quality control at a Retail or Consumer Product organization
- Strong written and verbal communication skills in English and Mandarin required
- Ability to be self-reliant and work independently
- Demonstrated ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously
- Proven technical acumen demonstrated within a manufacturing, quality or consumer products environment
- Frequent travel is required
 
** Send us your resume including your current and expected salary by email to: Elas.Qin@cantire.com

** All information collected will be used for recruitment purposes only.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department    elas.qin@cantire.com Phnom Penh- Cambodia.

Job Description:
• To establish, develop and maintain effective customer relationship in order to sustain and promote growth of sales operations in order to achieve the set turnover / profit / market share forecasts.
• To improve market coverage, and develop new market segments / Application fields.
• To negotiate with customers at the best interest of the company.
• To achieve annual sales target assigned to team and individual.
• To proceed all quotations and offers, sales contracts, and all official letters related to customers.
• To develop sales forecast.
• To provide sales presentation to potential leads/buyers 
• To communicate with clients related to Sales & Marketing Activities.
• Coordinate and provide support to all potential clients to achieve sale’s target, follow up and analyze the sales report.
• Coordinate and solve problem with clients and stakeholder.
• Analyze sale of business performance.
• To provide required reports and planning as well as sales forecasts.
• To keep confidential all company business information and documentation.
• Train the sales team on sales strategies and SOPs.
• Other tasks assigned by the management.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor degree in Marketing & Sale or related degree
• At least 3 years of work experience in Sale Manager/Senior of Real Estate or Relevant post.
• Knowledge on Real Estate infrastructure, Strategy and planning
• Strong in Sale & Marketing Concept on Real Estate
• Proficiency written and spoken communication skills (both Khmer and English or Chinese is better)
• Knowledge and application of sales techniques such as building rapport, needs/values selling, negotiating, and closing the sale
• Good interpersonal and marketing skills, as well as good knowledge of the property market.
Company Profile:
Northbridge Cambodia is a life style community of international standards, with single-family homes and apartments. The well-designed residences offer attractive surroundings, exquisite landscaping and quality design. The finishing work, furniture, appliances are all of the highest quality.

Every need has been considered to ensure comfort, while providing maximum privacy for each family. The villas feature large terraces that offer space for outdoor living that is so prevalent in this tropical setting. Each design combines the best of well-planned indoor space and outdoor living areas.

job title: ផ្នែកលក់ Sales Outdoor ( $200 - $300 ), at Stop Nokia 2004.

job title: បុគ្គលិកលក់ក្នុងហាង (Sales Associate, Circle K)

Location: Banteay Meanchey，Battambang，Phnom Penh，Preah Sihanouk，Siem Reap，Stung Treng
Job Description:
- ជំរាបសួរអតិថិជន ប្រកបដោយភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងជួយជ្រោមជ្រែងផ្តល់សេវាកម្មរហ័សប្រកបដោយសុជីវធម៌
- ណែនាំផលិតផល និងទំនិញប្រកបដោយសុជីវធម៌
- ដោះស្រាយរាល់បញ្ហារបស់អតិថិជន ឬបញ្ជូនបន្តរទៅថ្នាក់លើ
- រក្សាអនាម័យផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន និងអនាម័យនៅទីតាំងធ្វើការ
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យស្តុកទំនិញ និងទុកឧបករណ៍ប្រើប្រាស់អោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
- សម្អាត និងដាក់ឧបករណ៍ដែលបានប្រើប្រាស់រួចត្រឡប់ទៅកន្លែងដើមវិញ
Job Requirement:
- ត្រូវមានសញ្ញាបត្រមធ្យមសិក្សាទុតិយភូមិ ឬនិស្សិតសាកលវិទ្យាល័យ
- ត្រូវមានភាពបត់បែនបន្ទាន់បាន ក្នុងការផ្លាស់ប្តូរវេនការងារម្តងម្កាល
- ត្រូវមានភាពឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម និងចូលចិត្តធ្វើការជាក្រុម

*ម៉ោងការងារ:
- វេនព្រឹក (05:30 AM - 02:30 PM)
- វេនរសៀល​ (01:30 PM - 10:30 PM)
- វេនយប់ (09:30 PM - 06:30 AM)
Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

Currently Circle K Cambodia is having more than 35 Store locate in the following:

- Siem Reap

▪ Strongly in team work

▪ Monday to Friday: 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM

▪ Familiar with MS. Office, Photoshop, Illustrator.
▪ Able to work under pressure and meet deadlines

- Reconciling finance accounts and maintaining spreadsheets
- Credit control, preparing statutory accounts and cash allocation
- Sales order processing and managing daily post in & out
- Handling and writing cheques and reconciliation of direct debit mandates
- Receiving and processing all invoices, expense forms and requests for payment
- Verifying calculations working with the accounts system
- Managing petty cash transactions
Job Requirement:
- A university degree in related field
- A good command of English Proficiency
- Book-keeping (preferred)
- Excellent interpersonal skills – to deal with customers and external contacts
- Flexibility (e.g. adjusting to changing circumstances and working on a variety of tasks)
- Demonstrated enthusiasm for learning/professional development
Company Profile: The Australian Centre for Education (ACE) is leader in the provision of English language teaching and international education services in Cambodia and the South East Asia region. Currently, ACE operates on four campuses in Phnom Penh and one campus in Siem Reap. ACE is an initiative of IDP Education, a world leader in international education and student placement services. IDP is part-owned by 38 Australian universities and is also a co-owner of the International English Language Testing System (IELTS). For more info about ACE or IDP: www.acecambodia.org or www.idp.com/cambodia

Job Description:
- To effectively participate in and implement yearly Marketing Communication Plan and within budget of the company’s food chain brands.
- To make sure that promotional campaigns being correctly implemented at the store level such as briefing staff, leaflet distribution, banner hanging, poster placement, etc.
- To follow up and conduct surveys on competitors’ advertising and promotional activities; do consumer research; and analyze the company’s promotional campaign results
- To effectively coordinate with franchisors’ Marketing department for various marketing programs and adapt for Cambodian markets.
- To work closely with graphic designer and production house to deliver high quality work at low cost 
- To manage overall media relations for the company achieving of frequent, timely and positive media coverage; and to closely monitor the company’s media placement.
- To update daily sale report and take action to drive sale within budget of the company. 
- To keep records of competitor’s and company’s marketing communications, and up-date company’s marketing expenses
- To organize and participating in Sponsoring activities, and attend at opening nights, press launches, trade shows, public meetings and similar events; and organize leaflet distribution,
- To work closely with Store Managers to come up with Local Store Marketing (LSM) programs for stores in need.

Financial Responsibility

- Responsible for Marketing Expense and review following the annual budget plan
Job Requirement:
Travel Requirement

- 30% of the time travelling to stores to visit and checking the consistency of the implementation, and traveling to the province. 

Job Requirement

-At least 1-3 years experience in similar position

-Experience with budgets and forecasting
-Strong skill in driving for results
-Strong in people management and development

Due to a large number of applicants, we will only be able to follow up with candidates who are shortlisted for an interview, and this will happen within 10 working days from the date of your application.
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

Currently Circle K Cambodia is having more than 35 Store locate in the following:
- Phnnom Penh
- Siem Reap

- ត្រួតពិនិត្យស្តុកទំនិញ និងទុកឧបករណ៍ប្រើប្រាស់អោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
- ទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការបញ្ជាទិញស្តុក និងការលក់ដែលបានគ្រោងទុកប្រចាំខែ
- ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហានៅពេលដែលអតិថិជនមានសាច់ប្រាក់មិនគ្រប់គ្រាន់ ឬបង្កាន់ដៃមានបញ្ហា
- ជូនដំណឹងទៅការិយាល័យកណ្តាលនៅពេលប្រតិបត្តិការកាតឥណទានមានបញ្ហា ឬប្រព័ន្ធគិតលុយមានបញ្ហា
- បង្ហាត់បង្រៀនបុគ្គលិកថ្មី និងផ្តួចផ្តើមគំនិតដើម្បីថែទាំបុគ្គលិកថ្មី
- សម្អាត និងដាក់ឧបករណ៍ដែលបានប្រើប្រាស់រួចត្រឡប់ទៅកន្លែងដើមវិញ
- កិច្ចការផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមការចាត់តាំងដោយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងហាង ។
Job Requirement:
- ត្រូវមានសញ្ញាបត្រមធ្យមសិក្សាទុតិយភូមិ ឬនិស្សិតសាកលវិទ្យាល័យ
- ត្រូវមានភាពបត់បែនបន្ទាន់បាន ក្នុងការផ្លាស់ប្តូរវេនការងារម្តងម្កាល
- ត្រូវមានភាពឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម និងចូលចិត្តធ្វើការជាក្រុម
- ត្រូវមានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច១ឆ្នាំក្នុងការលក់រាយ ឬផ្សារទំនើប

*ម៉ោងការងារ:
- វេនព្រឹក (05:30 AM - 02:30 PM)
- វេនរសៀល​ (01:30 PM - 10:30 PM)
- វេនយប់ (09:30 PM - 06:30 AM)
Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

Currently Circle K Cambodia is having more than 35 Store locate in the following:
- Phnnom Penh
- Siem Reap

job title: Executive, Project Sales - ផ្នែក លក់ (ចេះចិន)
position: Executive, Project Sales - ផ្នែក លក់ (ចេះចិន)
Job Description:
Summary of Position

Responsible for collecting data and providing recommendations for market improvement.  Working and supporting customers to ensure that product is safely delivered on time through good communication with all parties.

What you will do:

Monitor and control individual sales to achieve the yearly target assigned by the supervisor
Work with supervisor to ensure understanding of the same direction
Provide good quality products and services to customers through communication with all parties
Understand the market trends by collecting all market information and suggestion to improve sales
Complete credit proposal form with relevant documents and recommendations to ensure that debts are monitored and collected following credit terms
Perform other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
What you should have:

Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Civil Engineering, or a related field
1 to 2 years minimum sales experience in a similar position within our industry will be preferred, and an added advantage
Competent knowledge of sales, and marketing methodology
Demonstrate excellent communication skills
Having a valid driving license is essential and one must be able to travel.

What we offer:

We offer attractive remuneration and fringe benefits including free meals, Seniority payment, bonus, and insurance, etc. with excellent career development opportunities to the right candidates.
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description: • Accountable for all services to make sure the surrounding environment is in a suitable condition to work• To ensure all facilities are maintain and safe environment, Risk accident management, prepares tools for protection of accident• Assist in performing "move in, move out" inspections using the "Move in, Move out" Inspection Form• Problem solving Maintaining a safe environment with proper lighting, signage, and disability access• Report any tenant complaints to upper management and site safety by making safety inspections• Handle supplies and refill of any used products, have a general knowledge of unit repairs• Perform periodic light inspections of common areas to detect lighting or security hazards• Staff orientation at each site to make sure they have cleared environment and safety• Coordinate with upper management any and all operating problems and solutions• Train to subordinate to protect and use all tools to reduce risk accident on site• Maintaining quality control procedures and follow a work priority system• Perform minor to mid-level repair jobs can be handled, with adjustments for • Manage any building maintenance to maintain the working environment• Ensure all risk accidents are created and all used properly on sites• Upkeep of the landscape around the common areas of compound• Follow the proper procedure of documenting all duties handled• Maintain budgets and optimize expenses for maintenance team• Set discipline of facility maintain and safe environment• Other tasks will be assigned by direct manager.

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.
Contact Info: Contact Information Chao Ang Amrintr  010222019 amrintr.c@villagephnompenh.com Phnom Penh #1159, National Road 2, Phum Preaek Ta Nu, Sangkat Chak Angrae Leu, Khan Mean Chey, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 010222019

Company Profile: Paragon International School (Paragon ISC) is one of Cambodia's international/bilingual schools, enrolling over 1100 students. Paragon ISC is controlled by The School Board. The administration and teaching staff represent over 20 different countries. The average teaching experience of Paragon ISC teachers is over 10 years. Our primary focus is on internationalism in order to create open-minded world citizens who have an international perspective, are self-confident and conscientious, and who can function as leaders and team members in societies all over the world.Paragon ISC is certified by the Cambodian Ministry of Education and it is accredited by CIS (Council of International Schools). Paragon ISC is also a  Cambridge Exams and PD Centre. Students may enter Cambridge tests and receive a certificate.Paragon ISC graduates have been accepted at many prestigious universities around the world, such as Australia, Japan, New Zealand, USA and more.
Contact Info: Contact Information Paragon International School  +855 (23) 72 72 82 cv@paragonisc.edu.kh Phnom Penh Icon Building E5(5th Floor), #68, Norodom Blvd. Phnom Penh, Cambodia +855 (23) 72 72 82

Job Description: ● Abstract all new leases entering information into Google Doc. ● Enter and manage all lease notes, maintaining critical dates and tickler files.● Follow up as required to ensure asset and property management and leasing are aware of any approaching option dates and required action.  ● Review and prepare for execution and distribution, leases and exhibits to proper parties.  ● Create and maintain a system/ Google Doc of tracking expiration dates of leases. Job Description:
- Prepare document the daily records and reports of the duties performed around the common area and inside the units
- Perform minor to mid-level repair jobs can be handled, with adjustments for outsourced repairs that are outside the scope of internal work

Job Description: Teaching Assistant Job Requirements at Paragon International School Kindergarten Campus Help children in feeding, and changing diapers Plan long and short-term activities to engage children throughout the course of the day Encourage children to take part in class and recreational activities Observe and monitor children to ensure that they are comfortable and intervene following signsof distress Assist older children in partaking their meals and using the facilities Ensure the physical and emotional comfort of children by providing them a safe environment Supervising children within the facility as well as during outdoor playtime and field trips Assisting children in their activities, including educational and artistic projects Supervising and assisting children during meals and snacks Assisting with hygiene and, in the case of younger or special needs children, changing diapers orassisting with using the toilet Paying attention to a child's emotional state and development, reporting concerns to ahomeroom teacher. Handle cleaning and maintenance activities of the classroom and ensure that any hazardousmaterials are discarded before children arrive Assisting children in and out times.Benefits:●        Free lunch at school●        National Social Security Fund Medical insurance●        Paid public holidays●        Paid a 20-day holiday

Job Description: ** The Human Resources Clerk is responsible for assisting the HR department in human resource related activities within the workplace. The HR Clerk is responsible for assisting with clerical duties related to uniform, employee’s birthday, manage employee’s welfare. Other tasks and duties assigned would be requested or assigned by HR manager.
Job Requirement:
• High School Diploma or equivalent required 
• Computer proficiency using MS Office applications (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, internet and e-mail). knowledge of Finger Print System is an advantage.
• Excellent communication (oral and verbal), interpersonal, organizational, and time management.
• Fluent in English, both writing and speaking
• Good personality, team work, and team building skill
• Be responsible, trustworthy and respectful
• Demonstrate sound work ethics
• Be flexible, smart and faster.
• Especially good responsibility and knowledge of job objective and matter.

** Please submit your CV and send it to roath@hotelcara.com or submit direct to following address:
- Address : N18, Stree 310, Sangkat Boeng Keng Kang, Khan Beong Keng Kang, Phnom Penh, Cambodia.
- Tel: 012-614-067 / 087-555-817
Closing Date: 30-Sep-2022
Company Profile:
Genki Sushi was founded in 1968 with the promise of bringing sushi to the masses. Backed by strong brand and product development capable of adapting to the changing times and customer needs, Genki Sushi has established a network of over 140 restaurants across Japan. 

Sushi, an integral part of Japan’s food culture, has transcended national borders to become popular as a healthy alternative in countries all around the world. Genki Sushi was a pioneer in the industry, opening its first directly managed restaurant in Hawaii in 1993. Since then, continued to expand the franchise throughout Asia including Hong Kong, Singapore, Indonesia, Kuwait, Philippine, China, Thailand, and now Cambodia.  

We are currently seeking for potential candidate to join the outlet setup in Phnom Penh and more locations in the future who is passionate in F&B industrial and specializing in Sushi.
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms. Srey Roath  012 614 067 / 087 555 817 roath@hotelcara.com #18, St. 310, Beong Keng Kang I, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 012 614 067 / 087 555 817
